comment: Negation law (even function) for the X sequence. The method of proof used for the previous four theorems ~ rmxyneg , ~ rmxyadd , ~ rmxy0 , and ~ rmxy1 via ~ qirropth results in two theorems at once, but typical use requires only one, so this group of theorems serves to separate the cases. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)
